title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1324/94 of 8 June 1994 fixing for the 1994 marketing year the reference prices for plums
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1324/94 of 8 June 1994 fixing for the 1994 marketing year the reference prices for plums
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 11 June 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 June 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 338, 31. 12. 1993, p. 26.
(3) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 320, 22. 12. 1993, p. 32.
(5) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 29.
(6) OJ No L 158, 30. 6. 1993, p. 18.
